name: @viero/ui
description: WebComponents based UI elements used by @vieroinc.

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean && babel src -d ./dist --source-maps inline
scripts.build:nolint: npm run clean && babel src -d ./dist --source-maps inline
scripts.dist: npm run build && copyfiles -u 1 "src/**/*.html" dist/ && copyfiles -u 1 "src/**/*.css" dist/ && copyfiles package.json README.md LICENSE.md dist
scripts.dist:nolint: npm run build:nolint && copyfiles -u 1 "src/**/*.html" dist/ && copyfiles -u 1 "src/**/*.css" dist/ && copyfiles package.json README.md LICENSE.md dist
scripts.npmjs: npm run dist && npm publish ./dist --access public
